result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.orig: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.html: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...
result.ponchtml: Cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.eng: Whoever did it, he will pay for it.
result.ga: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé as
result.orig: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé as
result.html: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé asWhoever did it, he will pay for it.
result.ponchtml: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaiḋ sé asWhoever did it, he will pay for it.

result.eng: I don't do it often, anyway.
result.ga: Ní dhéanaim go minic é cibé ar bith
result.orig: Ní dhéanaim go minic é cibé ar bith
result.html: Ní dhéanaim go minic é cibé ar bithI don't do it often, anyway.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋéanaim go minic é cibé ar biṫI don't do it often, anyway.

result.eng: Whatever my reason for it was...
result.ga: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.orig: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.html: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...
result.ponchtml: Cibé cén t-údar a ḃí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar á ċur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
